deletionbased LSTM model.from sentence: To this end , we extend the deletionbased LSTM model for sentence compression by .

explicitly introduce.from sentence: Specifically , we propose two major changes to the model by : We explicitly introduce POS embeddings and dependency relation embeddings into the neural network model .

final predictions.from sentence: ( 2 ) Inspired by a previous method , we formulate the final predictions as an Integer Linear Programming problem to incorporate constraints based on syntactic relations between words and expected lengths of the compressed sentences .

bi-directional LSTM.from sentence: In addition to the two major changes above , we also use bi-directional LSTM to include contextual information from both directions into the model .
